test_scenarios.name: Create Account and Login
steps: Enter valid email address, password, and business location.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the Square Dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Process a Basic Card Present Payment
steps: Log in to the Square Dashboard.
Swipe a valid test credit card using the Square Reader (if connected) or enter the card details manually.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Payment is successfully processed, and a confirmation screen is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to Sales Reporting Dashboard
steps: Log in to the Square Dashboard.
Click on 'Reports' in the left navigation menu.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully redirected to the Sales reporting dashboard showing sales overview data.
